Values/Format:
1: Patient received Drug A
0: Patient did not receive Drug A
Descriptions: Drug A indicator, used as target variable for machine learning
Date patient was diagnosed with Disease X
Age of patient when diagnosed with Disease X
Number of conditions making a patient higher risk of progressing to severe Disease X
Primary specialty description of physician diagnosing Disease X
State of physician diagnosing Disease X
Type of location where patient was diagnosed with Disease X
